name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce infrastructure at scale.
I've been coding for 13 years, with 434 public repos and 1.8K+ stars. I work primarily in Go and TypeScript, building backend systems, developer tooling, and AI integrations.

Side projects include aiocean.io (MCP ecosystem), obsidian-open-gate (221⭐ Obsidian plugin), and jira-mcp (79⭐ Go-based Jira connector). I write about engineering and product thinking at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016. Built multiple open-source tools for developers, with focus on AI agents, MCP servers, and real-time systems.
My approach: Ship fast, iterate with users, build tools that solve real problems. Pi-shaped: deep technical skills in backend/AI tooling, broad understanding of product and systems.
Currently exploring Claude Code plugins, MCP integrations, and AI-assisted development workflows.
now: Building invest dashboard (18 commits last 2 days)
